Thank you for reaching out and sorry for the late response.We understand that drivers were previously allowed to stack orders.Unfortunately as there has been an increase in the number of cases where drivers are late for delivery due to the stacking of orders  our clients have reached out to us and they do not want drivers to be stacking orders.Please ensure that you do not stack orders and take the orders at least 30 minutes apart.
